data.actual_result: You can hover over items, server icons and general responsive areas of the application but it won't do anything when you click on it. Dark Theme // Compact // Win10 // Using downloaded discordapp for win10
data.expected_result: Client freezes after the file is uploaded to the conversation you are kicked from, requires a soft-reboot in order to begin working again.
data.short_description: Client freezes after an upload is made  to a conversation you are kicked from
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a group chat with a few friends.- Click the file upload button and wait to be kicked from the group.- Upload the file and your client will freeze until you soft-relog Discord.
